about_the_game:
You are an expert in the secret art of the oil massage. So put those skills and those hands to good use and have your way with a cute girl!

The final part in a trilogy of games by developer, Girl's Software!

STORY


Our protagonist is both a masseuse and an otaku cameraman. During a comic event, he notices the sexy gravure idol, Mio. His masseuse senses tingling (?), he signs up for a personal photo session with Mio. During the session, he uses the power of persuasion (???) to convince a tired Mio to accept a secret oil massage from him.

While Mio is weary of his actions, soon she is enraptured by his technique...

It's time to experience the ultimate fantasy photo session with Mio the gravure idol!

CHARACTER


Mio
CV: Mitou Mio

Cosplay Gravure Idol
Height: 161 cm
3 Sizes: B: 85cm, W: 58cm, H: 85cm
Blood Type: B

A cosplay gravure idol who is a bit of an otaku but tends to talk to her fans like an older sister. Someone that likes to speak her mind. She rather enjoys the sexual aura conveyed in her gravure photos. Also is an enjoyer of sex.

FEATURES

  • Visual novel featuring the Kuri Kuri System: An in-game mode that allows you to touch and fondle Sora. Watch as she erotically reacts to each time you touch her. The more you touch (click) on her, the situation will evolve
  • Dolphin waxing control: No need to click to the end of the scene to finish. That timing can be executed at any time
  • CG and Scene mode to revisit scenes in the game
  • Multiple choices and endings
  • Full character animation: Both dialog and scene portions of the game are animated. Dynamic camera work let's you enjoy all of Sora's good angles
  • Heroine voiced by popular gravure idol, Mitou Mio in her voice acting debut
  • Features English language support with Japanese voice audio

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains consensual and nonconsensual sexual content and themes and is not suitable for anyone under the age of eighteen or where adult content is not legal.

name: Kuri Kuri Click! ~My Sweet Model!~

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Kuri Kuri Click! ~My Sweet Model!~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.66 GHz and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1600 x 900 resolution, 256 MB VRAM and above
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

short_description: Our protagonist is an oil massage expert as well as an otaku photographer. Use the secret art of the oil massage to have a wild photoshoot with a gravure idol in the final part of the Kuri Kuri Click series!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
